channel.title: Finance on Erik Misc.
channel.description: Recent content in Finance on Erik Misc.

item.title: TAQ Consolidated
item.description: For a recent revision, I have had to dig into TAQ data. This is something relatively new to me, but I had to figure out some statistics out of the consolidated trade data. I did not want to use SAS because I do not have a PC running windows, and SAS for linux is very painful. So here is a method for getting annoying statistics from annoyingly large data. The goal was to estimate the order imbalance volatility on the U.
